faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What is a tax residency certificate (TRC) in the UAE?
items.answer: A UAE tax residency certificate in the UAE is an FTA-compliant document that empowers you to unlock DTAA benefits and verify your residency status.

items.question: How do I know if I'm eligible for a tax residency certificate?
items.answer: You can issue a tax residency certificate if you meet the residential status and document requirements. You can book a free consultation to determine your eligibility.

items.question: What is the timeline for a tax residency certificate?
items.answer: Generally, it takes 1-14 days to secure TRC approvals, following the submission of the application and payment of the necessary fees.

items.question: How will I receive my UAE tax residency certificate?
items.answer: Our experts will process your TRC application through the FTA portal, allowing you to download the certificate digitally within seconds.

items.question: Do I need to apply for a TRC if I own a Free Zone company?
items.answer: Yes, a TRC empowers your Free Zone company to qualify for corporate and personal income exemptions, as well as save up on import-export taxes.
